remarks: Value of the floor (greatest integer) function.  The floor of ` A ` is the (unique) integer less than or equal to ` A ` whose successor is strictly greater than ` A ` .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Nov-2013.)
statement:
flval $p |- ( A e. RR -> ( |_ ` A ) = ( iota_ x e. ZZ ( x <_ A /\ A < ( x + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
